title: My lol game wont open after champion select
body: after i open my lol client and finish champion select the load screen dose not come up. all that happens is that it closes and then nothing after that no black screen i just goes{{item:3070}}  to what ever else i had open on my desktop at the time

replies.body: Im having the same issue, i load into the game and log in, no problem. Ill get into a game (in my case it was thankfully a bots) i selected my champion and the game began, but the kernal never popped up and i never reached the loading screen that shows champions and hero powers. Please help us...
